results.idea: Short-term momentum: buy stocks with strong 5-day returns and high recent volume
results.description: Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining price returns and volume (two datafields). SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields). SUGGESTION3: if coverage low, apply ts_backfill to volume; noted as optional. SUGGESTION4: user/alpha counts unavailable so not used. Kept KEEP_IN_MINDs: implementation uses 2 datafields and 3 operators. Confidence set to 0.65 based on common momentum robustness.

results.idea: Mean-reversion on 10-day z-score of returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1: single datafield (close) to keep signal clean. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill optional if missing prices. SUGGESTION4 not applicable. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected: short implementation. Confidence 0.6 reflecting classic mean-reversion evidence.

results.idea: Earnings surprise continuation: buy stocks with positive earnings surprise and upward revisions
results.description: SUGGESTION1 used: combines earnings_surprise and eps_revision. SUGGESTION2 no vector fields. SUGGESTION3: if eps_revision sparse, apply ts_backfill. SUGGESTION4: not available. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed (2 datafields). Confidence 0.7 due to persistent post-earnings drift.

results.idea: Implied vs realized volatility reversal: short high IV vs realized move
results.description: SUGGESTION1: uses implied_vol and ts_std_dev of returns (two fields derived from close). SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied to implied_vol when sparse. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.6 for options-vol relative signals.

results.idea: Short interest squeeze indicator: long stocks with rising short_interest and rising option call OI
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combined short_interest and option_call_oi. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill short_interest over 60 days if sparse. SUGGESTION4 not available. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two datafields only. Confidence 0.5 due to episodic nature.

results.idea: Low-volatility premium: long low 60-day return volatility stocks
results.description: SUGGESTION1: single field (close) used to compute ts_std_dev. SUGGESTION2 not relevant. SUGGESTION3 not needed. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.68 since low-vol anomaly is well-documented.

results.idea: Volume spike breakout: price breakout with higher-than-normal volume
results.description: SUGGESTION1 combined ts_arg_max(price over lookback) with volume zscore. SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill(volume,30) if coverage low. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.62 for short-term breakouts.

results.idea: Sector-relative momentum: favor stocks outperforming their sector over 3 months
results.description: SUGGESTION1: uses close and sector group. SUGGESTION4 not available. SUGGESTION2/3 not relevant. Used group_neutralize concept via group_rank. KEEP_IN_MIND4 respected: sector used only as group parameter. Confidence 0.66 for relative momentum.

results.idea: Earnings revision momentum: z-score of analyst EPS revisions averaged across broker vector
results.description: SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION2: used vector analyst_eps_estimates and vec_avg to aggregate (one vector field). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill optional for sparse vectors. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MIND2: one datafield (vector) and few operators. Confidence 0.72 due to strong evidence of revision effects.

results.idea: Price-to-cashflow deep value: long stocks with low P/CF relative to peers
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combines price (close) and cash_flow (fundamental) via ratio. SUGGESTION4 not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill cash_flow quarterly if sparse. Applied group_neutralize via group to compare peers. KEEP_IN_MINDs: two datafields. Confidence 0.55 due to value timing risk.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large intraday swings: fade extreme 1-day returns
results.description: SUGGESTION1 single field close returns. SUGGESTION3: not needed. SUGGESTION2/4 not applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.59 as short-term reversals are common intraday.

results.idea: Price momentum adjusted by liquidity (Amihud): momentum scaled by inverse liquidity
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine ts_returns(close,60) with amihud (illiquidity) field. SUGGESTION3: backfill amihud if sparse. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.64; scaling by liquidity often improves Sharpe.

results.idea: Analyst sentiment divergence: buy stocks with rising analyst upgrades but low price reaction
results.description: SUGGESTION1 combined analyst_upgrades (vector count) and ts_returns(close,20). SUGGESTION2: wrap analyst_upgrades vector with vec_sum. SUGGESTION3: backfill analyst metrics if needed. SUGGESTION4 ignored. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.58 for delayed market reaction opportunities.

results.idea: Dividend revision momentum: long stocks with recent dividend increases and price momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine dividend_change flag and ts_returns. SUGGESTION3: backfill dividend_change quarterly. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. KEEP_IN_MINDs followed. Confidence 0.53 as dividend actions are informative but infrequent.

results.idea: Inventory drawdown improvement: long firms with falling inventories vs last quarter and improving margins
results.description: SUGGESTION1 combined inventory and gross_margin (two fundamentals). SUGGESTION2 not used. SUGGESTION3: backfill quarterly fundamentals. SUGGESTION4 not available. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence 0.5 due to sector variability.

results.idea: Option flow imbalance: favor stocks with elevated call OI growth relative to put OI

results.description: SUGGESTION1: aggregate via group_sum or group_mean on sector returns. Applied group_sum. SUGGESTION2 not used. KEEP_IN_MIND4 respected. SUGGESTION3/4 not applicable. Confidence 0.6 for sector timing.

results.idea: Buyback announcement momentum filtered by low short interest
results.description: SUGGESTION1 combined buyback_announcement and short_interest reversed. SUGGESTION3 backfill announcements. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.53 as buybacks with low shorts stabilize alpha.

results.idea: Momentum with group-scale normalization to reduce outliers
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_returns followed by group_scale using sector group. SUGGESTION4 not used. KEEP_IN_MIND4 respected. SUGGESTION2/3 not needed. Confidence 0.61 for improved cross-sectional stability.

results.idea: Relative earnings growth vs peers using group_mean
results.description: SUGGESTION1: rev_growth compared to group_mean within industry. SUGGESTION3 backfill rev_growth. KEEP_IN_MIND4 respected. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. Confidence 0.58 for peer-relative growth signal.

results.idea: Short-term reversal after large institutional outflows
results.description: SUGGESTION1: institutional_flow delta and reverse returns used. SUGGESTION3 backfill flows. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.5 as institutional moves can cause transient moves.

results.idea: High-margin stability: prefer firms with low ts_std_dev of gross_margin and positive momentum
results.description: SUGGESTION1 combined ts_std_dev(gross_margin) with ts_returns. SUGGESTION3 backfill margins. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.52 for stable margin premium.

results.idea: Relative currency-hedged momentum for exporters
results.description: SUGGESTION1: combine exporter_exposure and currency_returns correlation with stock momentum. SUGGESTION3 backfill exposures. SUGGESTION2/4 not used. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.47 due to macro dependency.

results.idea: Momentum in analyst EPS upward slope using ts_regression slope
results.description: SUGGESTION1: ts_regression on analyst_eps_series to extract slope; combine with price trend. SUGGESTION2: if vector apply vec_avg first. SUGGESTION3 backfill vector. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence 0.68 as revision slope is predictive.
